title: I'd like my Mastery Rank on Yasuo reduced
body:
[https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/192357592876449793/367407081395060746/flamboyant.PNG](https://cdn.discordapp.com/attachments/192357592876449793/367407081395060746/flamboyant.PNG)
Just look at it! It's _imperfect. Unacceptable._

See, I just want my Gold/Red Mastery Symbol back to bring the composition back to perfection. I hope that's a possibility

replies.body: Unfortunately not =(. Because of how that mastery data is tied to your account, we can't lower them at request.
